title: Hi! After 4000+ games im still bronze 5. ask me anything!
body: i got to bronze 4 several times but i go right back to b5

replies.body: Dude you will get out just keep trying I got out of bronze yesterday. You can do it!

Hi. I've only played 2500 games so I haven't got to Bronze 5 yet.

Can you help me out with an item build path so as to optimize my bronze 5 potential?
i find that no matter what role or champion mobility boots and 5x bloodthirsters works fine. oh and dont waste money on wards you are better off saving it for items.

> [{quoted}](name=fum422,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ienWpbRs,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-09-03T05:35:16.406+0000)
 oh and dont waste money on wards you are better off saving it for items.

When my team demands I buy wards because I'm support or whatever, should I calm them by telling them that wards don't do damage so I'm saving for useful items?
Sure, why not, sounds like a plan.
All boots, all the time.
wow, and you dont even seem to be a troll. you've got troll masteries but your rune pages are alright. quite sad really

OMG WHY U SO BAD?!

Have you really played that many games and are still the lowest of low there possibly is?
is it 'muh team'?
what do u mean?
Did your team carry you all the way to bronze 5?

i carry in about 40% of the games i play but i still end up losing most of my games somehow. ive been trying so hard but if there was a division below bronze 5 id have deranked so many times more.

and yes my team is the reason im in bronze 5 they suck so much all the time a teemo loses to a darius top a jungle never ganks leblanc loses to annie mid etc etc

> [{quoted}](name=fum422,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ienWpbRs,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-03T05:57:49.497+0000)
>
> i carry in about 40% of the games i play but i still end up losing most of my games somehow. ive been trying so hard but if there was a division below bronze 5 id have deranked so many times more.
> 
> and yes my team is the reason im in bronze 5 they suck so much all the time a teemo loses to a darius top a jungle never ganks leblanc loses to annie mid etc etc

But doesn't that happen on the enemy team just as frequently?

> [{quoted}](name=fum422,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ienWpbRs,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-03T05:57:49.497+0000)
leblanc loses to annie mid etc etc

Like that last game in your history XD

I will add you on my Bronze 5 smurf and play with you in an hour. See if we can't improve that horrible fortune you've been having!

> [{quoted}](name=fum422,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ienWpbRs,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-09-03T05:51:35.060+0000)
>
> what do u mean?

it was your team's fault right ? xd
just pick a champion like yasuo and carry games its easy as 123 thats how i got to b1
Teach us senpai
Who's your drug dealer? Must be some pretty strong stuff to suppress all learning.
That's incredible!! What's your secret?
